query.value:
SELECT obsr_Spot_Code, to_char(now()- INTERVAL '1 day','YYYY-MM-DD') AS begin_Date
,to_char(now(),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_Date 
FROM cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t
;

preCopyScript.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_t      
 WHERE  date_time = to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
 and obsr_Spot_Code = '@{item().obsr_Spot_Code}'
 ;

query.value:
select obsr_Spot_Code,  to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date  
, to_char(now(), 'hh2400') AS time    
from cd_ods.tb_apis_agri_weather_spot_code_t 
   ;

select CMONTH2 as cmonth      
       from CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST
       where  BASE_DATE  = DATE(NOW()) - interval '1 MONTHS'
      group by cmonth2 
      order by cmonth

source.query:
SELECT 
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYYMM') AS std,
  to_char(date_trunc('month', dd), 'YYYY12') AS edt,
  hscode
FROM generate_series(
    '2020-01-01'::date,
    date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE),
    interval '1 year'
) dd
CROSS JOIN (
    VALUES 
      ('0201'),
      ('0202'),
      ('0203'),
      ('0207141010')
) AS hs(hscode)
;
